title: Average action camera
body: Its not fully 4k cam as mentioned it is interpolated 2880√ó2160 res. So i don't find recording on 4k res recomendable. You will not get that much clearity. As my experience ,indoor and night shoots not so impressive as you can see grain on videos as well as on pics. I have not used it in regular basis, so i can't comment on battery backups.. but as i have used it, i think battery backup is desent. It will last 45min or less on full HD 1920. Plus point is it has touch screen, which is more convenient and easy to control the UI. They also provide suffiecnt aceccerious for beginners. If you are a pro, i would recommend you should go for GoPro.

title: Charging port is wrong. FPV port on camera whereas the charging cable is mini USB.

title: Stupid Gyro stabilization, doesn't connect to your phone always.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Lost my SJCAM 6 legend after 3 months, thanks to it's awesome screw on the rotating J mount that they have provided. I can't believe it is such a small screw, it's my fault as well, I shouldn't have used that mount, but there was no alternative (I might be wrong).- They say that the gyro stabilization is good, I would honestly say that it's pathetic. If I mount the camera on the helmet, the shake can't be seen. But, if I take a shot using my hands, it fails miserably.- The app is a dumb app, it gets connected once and then it won't connect at all. You will have to restart your phone and then restart your camera, it very annoying when you have to do this all the time. Also, if by any chance your phone  is connected to your camera (first thank god) and if you happen to take it underwater, it gets disconnected just immediately! So, you have no clue what's happening underwater in case you wanted to keep it there.- Though there are many mounts, but they should have given a proper J mount that can be attached to the chin area of the helmet. I'm truly depressed because of this loss.- There is a waterproof screen attachment that is provided for the waterproof casing, which is so useless that it is better to use the present case as it is.- The touch is really nice but the options that are there in the camera, some are actually very stupid. It's irritating actually, some don't make any sense or you won't find any difference. But then, with such a budget you can't expect so much as well.- The wide angle is good, quality is not that great, you really can't compare this to GoPro's quality, obviously you will be disappointed.-2K and 4K are a joke, record at 1080@60FPS if you want some quality videos, you don't have a choice unfortunately.All I want to say is that, if you can wait for some time, save some money and get a GoPro, then that would be a better option that getting this camera. I might be venting everything out, but I lost my camera because of the rotating J mount. Also, if you have any friend of yours who owns an SJCAM, ask them for their honest opinions. Don't just believe on one YouTube review or online reviews, do a thorough research before you buy a camera. Go ahead if you want it immediately.P.s. the 3 stars are actually 2.5 stars for me.

title: Good for amateurs and much affordable at the same time.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†A really good budget cam for people who want to start with adventure sports, biking, instruments etc. The only drawbacks are it's battery back up and the sound which is very less (when the video is played in the camera itself).

title: The little camera that can.
body: At this price point, this is a great little camera. It's a good competitor to the more expensive action cameras around and can hold it's own in terms of build quality and picture quality. The waterproof housing is good and having used it on about a dozen dives up to 25m, the camera delivers. The wifi to transfer pictures to your phone is a great option, if a little fidgety. (Turn off the data on your phone to make the wifi connection work.) At this price point a good buy. Additional tip, for color correction of your dive photos use the dive plus (dive+) available on Android.

title: For beginners its a masterpiece
body: If you want to capture those bike rides or any of your adventures without spending much, just go for this camera. Its a perfect substitute for gopro. I have used it for a couple of rides and it gave good performance. Video quality is nice 1080p which looks great. Must buy if you cant afford gopro

title: Worst Ever Purchase - Please do not buy!!
body: It didn't even work for more than a day. And trust me if it gives problem than you won't get it serviced very easily. The manufacturer is from China, so they asked me to raise a support case in sjcam website and they expect us to ship it to China from own pocket i.e. spend 2000 bucks for the newly purchased product which is 5000 and you have barely used it for some hours. I could not return this product before the return window as I was in middle of the trip. It ruined trip too. Amazon gives service center names in Bangalore who are not ready to service this sjcam product when you say you have purchased through this site. My advice do not go for this cam.

title: Worst  camera ever purchased

  ¬†I purchased this cam in jan 2019. This camera did not even last for 5 months. Today when I tried to start this camera and  it wudnt. Now I got to know that non of the sjcam product has warranty. If it breaks, you are out of the game as neither amazon nor the manufacturer/ seller will support you. You are duped!I have attached the video please check. I would urge you please dont waste your money on this cheep quality camera.

title: One of the Best Budget Cams in the Market with Good Accessories and Decent Picture Quality
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Dear Readers,I had seen a number of videos on Youtube before making a choice to buy this Camera. It has met my requirements. To quickly summarise -Pros -1. Looks and Feel are amazing, similar to a professional high end Camera2. Picture quality is good in daylight (@1080p with 30fps)3. Good set of Accessories (also good quality) so need not spend too much apart from a shoulder band and chest band)4. All in all good at this price, definitely with the pennyCons - (can be improved)1. Picture quality and modes below 1080p are not upto mark, and something to do with low lighting.I have done an unboxing with review and test shots video which you can look into. Search for my name (Amol Keer) on Youtube for full videoThanks to Amazon and retailer for a good quality product. Expect good service going ahead :)

title: Trash
body: FraudPictures and accessories shown was just to attract customersWhat was delivered to me was a different productI'll be happy even if a different product was delivered to IF it works fine but what was delivered was complete trash, it doesn't detects memory card and battery is worstAt first i thought it was a battery defect so i ordered a new battery which cost me 800..it turn out it wasnt the battery problemI couldn't find out what the problem was...such a disappointment WASTAGE OF MONEY

title: Good product but a small issue...
body: The cam is very good...quality is very very nice at this price point...bttry bck up is quite nice...i got a recording time of 90 mins at 720p 30fps continuously...bt the only issue is that i didnot receive some stuffs..coz its really strange..the manual that i got with this cam had a list of the content according to which all the accessories are provided to me..it fulfils the list...but when i checked in the youtube unboxing videos i saw that the j mount and the velcro straps are also provided with it..which i didnt receive here..even the official sjcam site shows the content including the j mount and the velcros...i dont know if this is the original product..but i checked with the package serial number which shows online its a genuine sjcam product..but again the package had no seal on it..i m really confused coz the official site and the videos shows the j mount and velcro straps included..so plz amazon look into the matter..i prefers guys buy it from the official site..they charge more or less same amount...but overall the product is good..and the software works like charm with the video instantly downloading to ur phone with the wifi...go for sjcam 4000 guys..its a very good product...

title: Best Action camera for Beginners
body: SJ4000 is my first action camera that I have ever bought,since it's my first action cam I didn't want to put too much money on to it & the SJ4000 was perfect for this.The video quality is really good & doesn't feel cheap at all,you can shoot videos at 1080p or 720p depending on you liking.I use this camera for my Motovlogging & it has performed flawlessly, I'm quiet impressed by this action camera & the over all Value for Money is the best.All the accessories are given in the box itself you don't have to purchase an extras separately.I have been using this camera for a month now & I'm quiet satisfied with the product.Anyone who wants to buy their first action can should surely get the SJ4000.A great Action cam that doesn't burn a hole in your pocket!Amazon is selling 100% genuine SJ4000 & you can buy confidential without any regrets.Overall I'm very satisfied with this Action cam & will recommend this to anyone whose looking for their first Action cam at an affordable price.Checkout my YouTube channel- 'Super Biker' for all videos shot with the SJ4000 Action Cam

  ¬†Genuine SJCam4000 WiFi with good quality video and Picture.This is my first action camera, I do not know anything but I am surprised to see its photos and videos. Awesome action camera in this price range, i am checked on SJCAM official site to verify the genuinity.

title: Good product, a user manual for installation would be nice.
body: Bought it as a friend's wedding gift. So far he has used it for 1 bike ride. Video quality is great. Setting it up is more complicated than my garmin virb. It has lots of parts. Did not come with a detailed manual on how to use those parts. Had to rely on youtube videos for the same.

title: Really great offering...bang for the buck !!
body: Good value for money offering. Just now completed a 1100km drive with SJCAM set as a dashcam. With a 32GB memory card you can easily get last 10 hours of the drive (720p, 30fps, without sound). Nowadays started to use this for drives within the city also... Waiting for a chance to mount this on my helmet and explore possibilities. . . . .

title: Waste/ worst product I have ever received till date from Amazon.
body: Worst product, received damaged product, not working properly display turns white automatically starts and stops recording of the camera. My long distance ride cancel due to the measure fault of your product. Product and accessories are not proper as mentioned in box. Fully dissatisfied, please beware before purchasing this product from this seller.

title: Universe in a single package
body: The battery life is good. The quality is good too. There are alot of extra addons with the  camera like holders and mounts which even a gopro doesnt provide with the camera pack. The quality of the extraa couldve been better too. Overall, the camera is well functioning with even night shots being clearly visible. There is no port for an external mic and vloggers wont find it positive. But it does record decent sound and also is waterproof

title: The product SJ4000 is good, Quality of video and pictures is awesome
body: Bhaiyo, The product SJ4000 is good, Quality of video and pictures is awesome, auto brightness working perfectly. Night view quality good. The main point is WiFi, it's working with android app, you can record video and take shots from your smartphone and also you can download (videos and pictures) from camera to mobile. But drop point is, you can't use external mic.But, in this price SJ4000 is best option in action cams.

title: Fabulous Video !!!
body: Video quality was good, but the photo quality was not good, video lapse was a awesome feature, overall very satisfied with the product since I never use it to take photos.

title: Ok ok type of camera
body: I bought this on 3 may abd it was delivered on 10 may [expected much earlier].Good camera.Great build qualityNice packingGoof feelBut the image quality was good but disappointing and not yet tested in dark so cannot tell low light performanceIf u want a beginners camera go for itBut if more proffessional try something else...

title: Best budget action cam - but beware of fake ones

title: Best Action Cam in this Price

title: IF this is your first action Camera than go for it
body: I am using this camera since a week and i came to a conclusion that if this is your first action camera that dont look for any other alternative becoz this is the best in the budget of 6-7k and see to it you buy from a reputed seller such as Brainfreezer or Sjcam dont go for 100-200 buys less seller becoz they may be thirdparty seller.i was very confused between PROCUS RUSH and SJCAM SJ400 but Acoording to me go with Sj4000 it has got many extra and better Features.

title: Cheap Camera but having problems.
body: I bought sjcam4000 only about one month back. After the initial charging from the supplier, the battery is not charging now. I do not know whether the problem is with the battery or the camera. No problem with the charger.

title: Superb camera
body: Superb product I used it many times and it works very well I am now using it with my Drone and it flies very well and it captures very good and moreover it comes with a lot of accessories hurry and we can use it in almost anything and the camera is amazing I also tried it inside water after putting it in waterproof case and it works amazing

title: Good quality product but late delivery via amazon

title: Amazon Charging extra!!? Camera awsome.
body: Really good camera and replacement service considering the price we are paying. (‚Çπ6999~‚Çπ8500 Fluctuates)Yes we can purchase it @ $65 from gear bestand with import tax it cost around ‚Çπ5500. Amazon India charging extra but we are getting the EASY* replacement capabilities. Camera is great for moto vlogging and water sports and even for a dash cam. 1080p 30 fps. BUT NEVER UPGRADE UR FIRMWARE. it creates the wifi connection problem.

title: Best action can in this price range
body: Using this from past 5 months on my rides. Very nice quality videos. Perfectly waterproof as I have used in pool to take underwater shots. Only weak point is the mounts that come in the box. They can't withstand  too much stress.

title: Three Stars
body: Good product for those on tight budget!!!!!!!!!

title: Good action cam for the price range
body: Cam quality is good enough for this price range but not as good as a Sony handicam. Vast difference in the video clarity is evident when you compare a video shot under good light and one shot in twilight. The casing and the holders supplied with the cam are sturdy and quite good. Have not yet tested the water proof case. Audio recording is good enough.

title: Its a good product, shoot good quality videos and images but ...
body: Its a good product, shoot good quality videos and images but the problem is with the battery.The battery backup is quite low and moreover the battery expanded on the first charge itself.

title: Excellent stuff
body: Though its the base model, functions available are more than sufficient for a regular rider. Image quality and video quality are good. Built quality is excellent though the display resolution is not as expected. But worth the amount.

title: 100% Value for money and good quality
body: The camera is very good, I was first skeptical about placing this order since it was not fulfilled by Amazon, however the seller BrainFreezer was very prompt in his service and I can gladly say that I do not regret my decision for placing this order, coming to the camera, it is 100% as described, the video quality is crisp and clear, image quality is not that good, but gets the work done, also, my purpose of this purchase was mainly for videos and not for photos, hence the lack of quality in the images does not bother me much, on the other hand, the video quality is very good, 1 minute of 1080p footage weighs in around 240-250 mb of size, I'm using a 32GB micro SD card, due to this reason, the video quality is so good that it needs the support of a good memory card, Overall BEST performance for the price range. Couldn't have asked for more.

title: Bang for the buck
body: For ‚Çπ5k and some change, this camera is the best option to start your vlogs.Amazing picture quality, good image stabilization and around 2-3hrs recording on a single charge.ProsCan start right out of the boxBattery backup is good, I got 2.5hr recording on a single charge with one bar still left2k recording availableMany accessories available (mounts etc)Dash cam mode available in camera (still need to test)ConsMic sucks big time...Invest in an external mic.Says ulti 128gb supported, however still need to test that.Menu options are very confusingOnly USB cable provided to charge, I am using my mobile charger to charge the camera
